content: take refuge in a soft drapey sweater hug the elevation cardigan combines simple stitches and even easier construction for an easy almost-seamless pattern with a trim silhouette and just enough length this duster will add a punch to even the most basic of outfits you ll find this easy pattern to be meditative and easy to drop into for a few row at a time skills you ll practice include half_double_crochet double_crochet decreasing and post stitches if you ve never crocheted a sweater but always wanted to try this is a great entry-level pattern to get started with the ad-free pdf includes a written pattern and photo tutorial it s formatted for easy printing and even easier couch crocheting pattern uses worsted weight category 4 yarn and is written in sizes s-3x skill level - beginner sizing/measurements - the sample pictured is a s/m on a 5 9 model with a 38 bust size - fits bust s/m - 28-34 m/l - 34-40 l/1x - 40-46 1x/2x - 46-52 2x/3x - 52-58 downloading - this listing is for the elevation duster cardigan crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns view all our modern free crochet sweater patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/category/crochet/garments/
